评论概述: I love these more than I should
评论详情: I really, really like these sunglasses, though there’s a part of me that insists I shouldn’t.  I’m usually a Ray Ban guy. I wear Classic Wayfarers most of the time, and when I want a bit of a change I have a pair of Christopher Cloos aviators and a couple of pairs of folding shades, all of them eye wateringly expensive. I really dislike the feeling of cheaply made sunglasses, and I usually avoid them like the plague. This pair of NYS feel, compared to the usual quality to which I’m accustomed, like a cheaply made pair of sunglasses.  Now don’t quote me on that. I’m not familiar with the NYS brand, but in the box there’s a card that touts the handmade nature of the glasses, boasts of the ‘highest quality materials’ used in their construction and offers a lifetime warranty, none of which suggests that these are cheaply made. They just *feel* a little cheaply made. The frames flex to a degree that doesn’t feel intentional, the hinges feel uneven (one light to close, one a little heavier), and the arms don’t sit anywhere close to flush against the frame when you close them. They also come with a soft bag rather than a hard case. All of these issues I’d expect to see on glasses I picked up for $10 at a roadside stall.  And yet, I really like these things. I love their lightness. I love the way the mirrored lenses look against the clear frames. I love the size, and the way they sit comfortably and weightlessly on my face. I don’t know of a sub-$100 pair of sunglasses I like more than these.  And I’ll go one further. When my wife saw me open the package this morning she asked me to give her a pair of sunglasses, because I have half a dozen and she only has one (don’t @ me - she destroys sunglasses as if they said something mean about her mother). She went through my collection and decided she wanted either the $60 NYS glasses or my pair of $230 Christopher Cloos aviators, and she let me pick which one I’d keep. I chose to keep the NYS and give her the expensive pair. I know I’ll regret this when she inevitably drops them in a pile of gravel before driving over them in her car within 24 hours of putting them on for the first time (seriously, I don’t know how she does it), but right now I’m happy with my decision.

These sunglasses are fantastic. They fit great, they work great, and they look great. No negatives or probems, and they bring a special something... Really top rate. Better in person than on the flat screen. 6 Stars. Highly recommend.

Love the clear look. I don’t have a set that’s just clear plastic. I’m going to wear them for a bit to be sure they won’t cause soreness over hours of wear before I send them off to have prescription sunglasses lens installed into the frames. The hinges open and close very nicely and glide easily without any issues. They really do have a retro back in the day look to them and really ooze vintage stylish flavor.
